features: Provides long term control of dry, itchy skin.
Delivers 24 hour hydration and soothes dry, itchy skin
Fragrance and dye free, non-greasy and is easily absorbed.
body.description: Eucerin’s Skin Calming Cream provides 24 hour moisture and long term control of dry, itchy skin. The gentle formula contains soothing oatmeal that provides relief from itch and contains rich emollients that help moisturize and protect skin. The cream is easy to apply, non-greasy and is easily absorbed. Skin Calming Cream is safe for sensitive skin, fragrance and dye free, and is non-comedogenic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eucerin is the dermatologist-recommended skin care brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. Eucerin restores and sustains healthy-looking skin, and gives you the confidence that comes with having radiant, healthy-looking skin. Eucerin Skin Calming Daily Moisturizing Creme Relieve and help prevent dry, itchy skin with a daily creme specifically formulated to calm dry, itchy skin and keep it moisturized. This gentle, non-greasy formula combines calming natural oatmeal and rich moisturizers to soothe and comfort dry, itchy skin. Dermatologist recommended brand Provides 24 hour moisturization Natural oatmeal and emollient-rich formula helps soothe dry, itchy skin Free of fragrances and dyes For children under age of two, consult your doctor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer around!
reviews.reviewText: I use this on body and face everyday. Perfect for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suggested by a professional
reviews.reviewText: I accidentally fell down rge stairs and in my recovery I have been seeing a physical therapist to help me. She suggested that I purchase it for my dry skin. I have tried a lot of cream but it is not heavy and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to lotion for dry itchy skin
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is always in my bag! I have dry itchy skin and I’m constantly reapplying lotion. My skin feels so hydrated and calm after I use this lotion. I feel moisturized for at least a day too. With other lotions I feel like my skin dries out too quickly. The size of the bottle is perfect for someone who uses it everyday. It will last a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the Best OTC Lotions
reviews.reviewText: I was diagnosed with eczema 14 years ago, and the dermatologist recommended Eucerin to me, so I’ve been familiar with the brand for a long time. I’ve tried many, many types of lotion, cream, and ointment over the years. I’ve noticed I absolutely need them to be fragrance free, gentle, and rich. Some of the products I’ve tried left a greasy feel, but this Eucerin cream is different. It’s just the right amount of rich and nourishing for my dry, cracked skin, without leaving my hands greasy for hours. It goes on thick, but my skin quickly absorbs it in a matter of minutes, and it’s so calming to my eczema. It makes my chapped hands feel instantly better instead of worse, and it’s very soothing. Additionally, this bottle I ordered from Amazon is HUGE. I can barely fit my hand around it. I think this will last me a while, so I feel like I got a great deal on it! I highly recommend trying this if you have dry, sensitive skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Scent, No Sneezing
reviews.reviewText: This silky cream absorbs easily leaving dry winter skin soft but not greasy. It’s free of perfume which makes it free of sneezing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent product, but not a miracle solver
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes certain areas on the inside of my arms & an area here & there on my lower legs will get a flair-up presenting some red blotches that itch. Don't have excema or psoriasis, just seems like an itchy, sensitive skin, almost allergic reaction (To what? Who knows). If a good amount is applied to these blotchy areas, it does seem to help calm/soothe areas down fairly quick, but it doesn't last all day. Another layer has to be applied later on to get it to subside more. Fortunately, this isn't a daily thing for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lotion ever
reviews.reviewText: I have been using eucerin lotion since I was a teenager. My skin is always super smooth!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not greasy and gives immediate relief to dry and itchy skin.

reviews.reviewTitle: Si sientes una comezón qué te enloquece, la recomiendo.
reviews.reviewText: El producto llegó roto de la tapa, pero no se regó casi nada, y realmente me urgía así que lo tomé igual. Respecto al uso, fue de gran ayuda. Desde hace algunos meses me comenzó una picazón insoportable luego de bañarme o simplemente mojarme. Eran aproximadamente 10 o 15 minutos de locura, de querer llorar por la fuerte comezón en mis brazos y piernas principalmente, si bien lo único que se salvaba era mi rostro y cabeza, el resto no picaba tanto como mis brazos y piernas. No había erupciones (siempre y cuando yo no rascara, lo que hacía era darme golpecitos en la piel y soportar). Los doctores no dieron muchas soluciones, últimamente todo lo atribuyen al estrés, por lo que buscando en Internet encontré que esta crema podría ayudar con la comezón y un jabón astringente igual. Para entonces ya había intentado con aceites naturales, pues me decían que eran resequedad, pero no había ningún resultado. Por si sirve a alguien, comparto lo que sí ayudó: comencé a bañarme con agua templada, ni fría ni muy caliente (el agua muy caliente sólo empeora la picazón), me lavo el cuerpo con un cepillo suave, algo que no friegue muy fuerte y el jabón de concha nacar artesanal que compré aquí mismo en Amazon. Al secarme me doy sólo golpecitos suaves con la toalla, espero lo mejor que puedo un minuto o dos a que cualquier residuo de humedad se vaya y entonces me aplico esta crema maravillosa. La picazón no ha desaparecido, pero sí bajó la intencidad y la duración de esta. Al menos ya no siento deseos de gritar y mi corazón ya no se acelera por la comezón. Lo recomiendo grandemente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Prodotto ok e conforme alla descrizione
reviews.reviewText: Buon prodotto e utile x le indicazioni previste
Esperaba una presentación más chica por el precio y me llegó algo grande la verdad excelente servicio porque me ayudó mucho con mi piel

reviews.reviewerName: Muy malo, irrita mas la piel de lo que logra remover el vello
reviews.reviewText: Logra sanar un poco la piel dañada
